CustomField.formula: IF( Owner_Name__c = "Andy McCall","Management", IF(Owner_Name__c = "Pete Atkin","Industrial", IF( CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"CAE"),"Partner", IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"SMB"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"SB"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"AE1")),"SMB"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Fleet IS"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"MM")),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"IND"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Ind"))),NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"CNW"))),"IS"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Fleet ENT"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Ent"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Major")),NOT(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"IND"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Ind"))),NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"CNW"))), "ENT"&" "&Xactly_Segment_Region__c, IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Industrial"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"IND")),"Industrial", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Experimental"),"Experimental", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"CNW"),"Connected Worker", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Partner"),"Partner", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Renewal"),"Renewal", IF(OR(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"Management"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"VP"),CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"CS")),"Management",""))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Xactly Segment (Sales Role)
